attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Grass Basic Pokémon or Basic Pokémon with Team Aqua in its name and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Thick Poison
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
